title: 379 We Give This Child To You

lines: 1. We give this child to You, Our precious gift of love. Help us to lead each step aright With guidance from above.
2. O bless each child of Yours, And grant when they are grown, They will have learned to love Your way, And choose it for their own.
3. We give ourselves to You, And may Your Spirit fill Our hearts and home, that all we do Be subject to Your will.
